name: One-Handed
description:
You are a sentient hand. 

  • Charge and release projectiles from your hand.
  • Survive against 10 waves of enemies.
  • 5 enemy types and 1 boss.
  • Shop for items between waves, including:
    • Gloves alter projectile.
    • Bands alter defensive ability.
    • Rings alter stats.
  • High Score board.
  • Controller supported!

I will be working on this game over time, adding more content whenever I can, but I will also be working on other projects as well. If you encounter any issues playing, feel free to let me know and I will do my best to address them. I do hope you give the game a try!
